I looked into the available variants for the Action Camera to find the highest resolution, waterproof option that is currently in stock. Here are the best available options:

1.  **Silver, 4K Resolution, Waterproof** (Item ID: 6117189161) - Price: $481.50
2.  **Black, 4K Resolution, Waterproof** (Item ID: 6700049080) - Price: $466.75
3.  **Black, 1080p Resolution, Waterproof** (Item ID: 5925362855) - Price: $503.51

The 5K waterproof models are currently out of stock. Among the available waterproof options, the **4K models** offer the highest resolution.

Your original camera (1080p, non-waterproof) was $502.28. 
*   If you choose the **Silver 4K Waterproof** model ($481.50), you would receive a refund of **$20.78**.
*   If you choose the **Black 4K Waterproof** model ($466.75), you would receive a refund of **$35.53**.

Please let me know which one you would like to switch to. Also, please confirm if there are any other items in this order you wish to modify, as I can only perform a modification on this order once. Finally, I will need you to confirm the payment method for the price difference (your current method on file is PayPal).
